data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Swansea to take a throw-in in Brentford territory.
In the minute 2, Chris Kavanagh signals a Swansea throw-in in Brentford's half.
Swansea have a goal kick.
Emiliano Marcondes for Brentford drives towards goal at Griffin Park. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 4, Swansea awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Swansea in the half of Brentford.
In London Swansea's Rhian Brewster is caught offside.
In the minute 7, Swansea awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Swansea needs to be cautious. Brentford have an attacking throw-in.
Brentford have been awarded a corner by Chris Kavanagh.
In the minute 8, Chris Kavanagh signals a free kick to Swansea in their own half.
Free kick for Swansea in their own half.
Brentford's Henrik Dalsgaard has been booked in London.
In the minute 10, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Swansea close to the penalty box.
Ollie Watkins scores to make it 1-0 at Griffin Park.
Mathias Jensen instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 12, Swansea awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick in a good position for Brentford!
In London Brentford attack through Said Benrahma. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 14, It's a goal kick for the away team in London.
Goal! Brentford increase their lead to 2-0 through a well-placed header from Emiliano Marcondes.
Great play from Said Benrahma to set up the goal.
In the minute 18, Corner awarded to Brentford.
Brentford's Christian Norgaard gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Swansea defender.
Chris Kavanagh signals a free kick to Swansea in their own half.
In the minute 19, Conor Gallagher gets his shot on target but fails to score for Swansea.
Said Benrahma (Brentford) fires in a shot – and hits the post!
Ball goes out of play for a Swansea goal kick.
In the minute 21, Throw-in for Swansea in their own half.
Jake Bidwell (Swansea) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Chris Kavanagh awards Brentford a goal kick.
In the minute 24, Brentford's Bryan Mbeumo breaks free at Griffin Park. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Swansea at Griffin Park.
Chris Kavanagh awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 27, Said Benrahma (Brentford) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Free kick for Brentford in their own half.
Chris Kavanagh awards Swansea a goal kick.
In the minute 29, Ollie Watkins of Brentford is pulled up for offside.
Chris Kavanagh signals a free kick to Brentford in their own half.
Brentford have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 32, Swansea awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Swansea get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Brentford's half?
Swansea have been awarded a corner by Chris Kavanagh.
In the minute 34, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Brentford in their own half.
In the minute 37, Brentford's Said Benrahma gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in London.
Free kick for Brentford in their own half.
In the minute 39, The match at Griffin Park has been interrupted briefly for a check on Pontus Jansson, who is down injured.
Pontus Jansson for Brentford is back on the field again.
Throw-in for Brentford in the half of Swansea.
In the minute 42, Ball safe as Brentford is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Chris Kavanagh signals a Brentford throw-in in Swansea's half.
Chris Kavanagh signals a free kick to Swansea in their own half.
In the minute 44, Ball goes out of play for a Swansea goal kick.
Throw-in for Brentford at Griffin Park.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Swansea's Andre Ayew is back in action after a slight knock.
Throw-in Swansea.
In the minute 45, Swansea to take a throw-in in Brentford territory.
Can Swansea get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Brentford's half?
Throw-in Brentford.
In the minute 45, Chris Kavanagh blows to end the first-half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in London to check on Andre Ayew, who is grimacing with pain.
Chris Kavanagh has blown to start the second-half.
Swansea make their first substitution with Ben Cabango replacing Mike Van der Hoorn.
In the minute 46, The away team replace Jay Fulton with Yan Dhanda.
Goal! Brentford extend their lead to 3-0 through Bryan Mbeumo.
Rico Henry with an assist there.
In the minute 48, Chris Kavanagh awards the home team a throw-in.
Swansea awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Brentford have a goal kick.
In the minute 50, Ball safe as Brentford is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Chris Kavanagh signals a throw-in for Swansea, close to Brentford's area.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 53, Goal kick for Brentford at Griffin Park.
Chris Kavanagh signals a free kick to Brentford.
Ben Cabango (Swansea) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 55, Brentford's Ethan Pinnock attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Swansea have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Swansea in their own half.
In the minute 55, Can Swansea get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Brentford's half?
Brentford awarded a free kick in their own half.
Brentford's Ollie Watkins has run offside.
In the minute 57, It's a goal kick for the home team in London.
Throw-in for Swansea at Griffin Park.
Brentford awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 60, Chris Kavanagh waits before resuming play because Andre Ayew for Swansea is still down.
Goal kick for Brentford at Griffin Park.
Swansea’s Andre Ayew is on his feet again at Griffin Park.
In the minute 64, Throw-in for Brentford in their own half.
Connor Roberts of Swansea smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Swansea.
In the minute 67, Swansea's Rhian Brewster is on target but unsuccessful.
Throw-in Swansea.
Throw-in for Swansea close to the penalty box.
In the minute 73, Ball goes out of play for a Swansea goal kick.
Ball safe as Brentford is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Brentford awarded a free kick in their own half.
Chris Kavanagh awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 75, Yan Dhanda (Swansea) gets a yellow card.
Brentford's Ollie Watkins is whistled for offside at Griffin Park.
In the minute 76, The home team have replaced Bryan Mbeumo with Sergi Canos. This is the first substitution made today by Thomas Frank.
In the minute 77, Throw-in for Brentford in the half of Swansea.
Bersant Celina is on a sub for Kyle Naughton for Swansea.
Joshua Da Silva is replacing Emiliano Marcondes for Brentford at Griffin Park.
Goal! Swansea reduce the deficit to 3-1 through Rhian Brewster.
Throw-in for Swansea at Griffin Park.
In the minute 79, Swansea to take a throw-in in Brentford territory.
Chris Kavanagh blows against Swansea's Andre Ayew for offside.
Brentford's Joshua Da Silva misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 81, Chris Kavanagh awards Swansea a goal kick.
Free kick for Swansea in their own half.
Free kick for Brentford in the half of Swansea.
In the minute 82, Andre Ayew (Swansea) has received a yellow card from Chris Kavanagh.
In London a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Said Benrahma is booked for the home team.
In the minute 84, Throw-in for Swansea in their own half.
Brentford are coming forward and Said Benrahma gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in London.
In the minute 86, Can Swansea capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Chris Kavanagh signals a free kick to Brentford in their own half.
Mathias Jensen is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 89, Mathias Jensen returns to the field for Brentford after picking up a slight injury.
Throw-in high up the field for Swansea in London.
Chris Kavanagh signals a Brentford throw-in in Swansea's half.
Chris Kavanagh will wait an extra 6 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Brentford to take a throw-in in Swansea territory.
Brentford's Sergi Canos gets in a shot on goal at Griffin Park. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In London Swansea drive forward through Rhian Brewster. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Swansea awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Swansea.
Throw-in for Brentford at Griffin Park.
Corner awarded to Brentford.
Said Benrahma for Brentford gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Chris Kavanagh awards Swansea a goal kick.
Swansea have been awarded a corner by Chris Kavanagh.
Important block from the Swansea defence as Joshua Da Silva fires in a strike for Brentford.
Ball safe as Swansea is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In London, Bersant Celina of Swansea is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
The match has come to a close in London. The final score is 3-1.
Connor Roberts for Swansea has been booked by Chris Kavanagh and receives a first yellow card.
